title: Handle a Product Quality Complaint
description: A customer has received a product that is defective and wants a replacement.

tasks.description: Log a new customer complaint case, capturing the customer's details and the nature of the defect.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates a new case in the CRM.

tasks.description: Issue a Return Merchandise Authorization (RMA) for the customer to return the defective product.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates an RMA number and provides return shipping instructions.

tasks.description: Create a new, no-charge sales order for a replacement unit to be shipped to the customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates a replacement order.
